content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Place apples in a 9x13 inch baking dish.
2) In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine butter, maple syrup, cinnamon, ginger, lemon juice and vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "combine"@41:48 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "butter"@49:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "maple syrup"@57:68 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "cinnamon"@70:78 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "ginger"@80:86 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "lemon juice"@88:99 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "vanilla"@104:111 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a small saucepan"@6:22 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "medium heat"@28:39 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Bring to a boil, and drizzle equally over apples.
4) Cover with foil, and bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Cover"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( tool-4-0 "foil"@14:18 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "bake"@24:28 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-1 "preheated oven"@32:46 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "20 minutes"@51:61 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Remove cover, and continue to bake for 10 minutes, or until apples are tender.
